name: Level 8
description:
Hey there fellow internet traveller,

Didn't have much time to work on this one I'm afraid. The idea is simple though, work your way through some crazy levels that my brain came up with, and discover the way through on your own without help. 

It should work on pretty much any headset from what I know, supports both Steam VR, oculus desktop and oculus mobile and has been tested on both a quest and a cv1...

Anyway I hope you enjoy playing through the craziness that is my brain when I let it code random stuff 😂

Made for metafest jam 3... Theme: Discovery
